genresAdvancedInfo.name: russian romanticism
genresAdvancedInfo.description: This genre emerged in the 19th century and is characterized by its emotional and expressive melodies that evoke feelings of love, passion, and nostalgia. It often features lush orchestration and rich harmonies, with themes drawn from Russian folklore and literature.

index.heading: Your Spotify Stats
index.intro-first-line: Get statistics about your top artists, songs, and genres from Spotify.
index.contact-intro: If you have questions about Musicalyst or you are interested in sponsoring opportunities, please fill out this form.
index.name: Name
index.message-submitted: Your message has been submitted. Thank you for contacting!
index.time-ranges-content: Browse your most listened content on Spotify during last month, 6 months, or since you started using Spotify.
index.daily-updated-content: Your stats are updated every day showing your top content.
index.share-stats-content1: Feeling proud about your music taste?
index.share-stats-content2: Share your music profile for other users to discover
index.from-spotify-dedup-creators-heading: From the creators of Spotify Dedup
index.from-spotify-dedup-creators-content: We give more value to your Spotify account. Try out {spotifyDedupLinkOpen}Spotify Dedup{spotifyDedupLinkClose} and {spotifyIQuizLinkOpen}Spotify iQuiz{spotifyIQuizLinkClose}.
index.similar-user-profiles-content-other: These users listen to music styles similar to those of ##0##. Explore their profiles and discover more music.
index.similar-user-profiles-content-you: These users listen to music styles similar to yours. Explore their profiles and discover more music.
index.buy-me-coffee-content: Consider supporting Musicalyst buying a coffee.
index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify
index.head-description: Generate statistics about the music you play more often on Spotify. Your top artists, songs, and genres.
index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
